description:
Comfy for the classroom and tough for the trails, these versatile pants are a great day-to-day option for budding adventurers. The Explorer Stretch Pants are made from the same stretchy nylon fabric as our popular men's Mochilero Pants, and provide excellent mobility and UV protection. Slimmer legs tuck easily into socks for extra protection from bugs, and add some style for everyday wear.The pull-on elastic waist makes for quick changes for gym class or swim sessions at the lake.Made of stretch-woven nylon and spandex with a DWR (durable water repellency) finish to shed water and dirt.Fabric provides a UPF 50+ rating.Articulated knees.Pull-on elastic waist with faux fly.2 zippered front pockets.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade
name: MEC Explorer Stretch Pants - Children
